name: RoboSource
description:
You have gained remote control of one of the most powerful and fleeting power sources in the universe, the RoboSource. Using text commands, guide the RoboSource out of the cave system without draining all your power to win!

HTML version sometimes doesn't want to allow you to select the text input, reloading seems to fix it. Best results on downloadable versions!

All assets, trashy and otherwise made by us at Zazanders with Free and Open Source Software.
